contractObjectiveList.description: Destroy the Target, clear area of additional forces Enemies, and Escape
contractObjectiveList.title: Destroy Lieutenant Colonel Song and Escape

dialogueContent.words: Commander, we're receiving a transmission from the Liao forces.
Attention, mercenary forces. You are trespassing on sovereign Capellan Confederation territory.
If you retreat now, you will be spared. If you remain, we will wipe you out completely. Song out.
Song is down and their remaining forces are without a commander. All that's left is the cleanup. Well done, Commander.
Goddamn it, we were so close. Song's just contacted their commanding officer, and reinforcements are on the way. The operation is blown.
The Lieutenant Colonel is down, Commander. A Leopard is on standby for pickup.
Readings indicate the ambushing units are out of commision. The employer will be pleased.
That is our target, sustain fire on that unit!
Sensors are showing enemy movement beyond our intitial count. Be advised you might meet with increased resistance.
Commander, the target is bugging out! Eliminate them before they escape.

longDescription: Yang's been filling me in about Song, Commander. He says they're supposed to be the best shot in the entire CCAF. We're going to be lucky to get out of this one without serious losses.

objectiveList.description: The secondary objective to destroy an additional lance supporting the assassination target.
objectiveList.title: Destroy the Supporting Capellan Forces

objectiveList.description: The objective to destroy the Assassination Target.
objectiveList.title: Destroy Lieutenant Colonel Song

objectiveList.description: Hidden Objective for AutoComplete, Destroy Assassination Lance
objectiveList.title: Destroy Assassination Lance Hidden Objective

objectiveList.description: The objective for the player to escape and complete the mission.
objectiveList.title: Get to the Evac Zone

objectiveList.description: The objective to stop the assassination target for escaping, the player will fail if the target escapes.
objectiveList.title: Prevent the Target from Escaping

objectiveList.description: Armor of the Target is breached.
objectiveList.title: Armor Breached

shortDescription: Those aren't just reinforcements, Commander. That's our target: the CCAF commander, Lieutenant Colonel Song. As a reminder, they're a deadly MechWarrior as well as a skilled strategist. Their arrival on the field presents an opportunityâ€”if we act swiftly, we can achieve our goals here on Kern in a single strike, making this world an easy pickup when we mount the full-scale attack. This is it, Commander. Don't screw this up.
